questions.question: How ARE YOU FEELING today?
As you sit in your cell, what do you mostly think about?
Is there one or more people you think about more than others?
Age:
Highest Grade Completed:
Do you know your Father?
followUps: If so, how old is he?
What is your relationship with your Father?

questions.question: Do you know your Mother?
followUps: What's the relationship with your Mother?

questions.question: Do you have Grandparents?
followUps: Have they been involved in your life?

questions.question: Do you have siblings?
followUps: If yes, what is the gender and age of each?

questions.question: Have other relatives been involved in your life?
followUps: Which relations and type of involvement?

questions.question: What individual(s) have influenced your life either positively or negatively?
If anyone in your family has been murdered, wounded by gunfire, or incarcerated for criminal behavior, please tell who and what were their circumstances?
Do you recall visiting the doctor or dentist for health and wellness check-ups?
Were you ever prescribed any types of medication to take?
While living at home, did you always have plenty of food to eat?
followUps: Do you recall going to bed hungry?
Did you have food to eat on the weekends?

questions.question: Do you remember any of your childcare experiences before starting Kindergarten?
Do you remember any of your early childhood/elementary school educational experiences?
Did you like going to school?
Do you recall having problems at school with your teachers, administrators or students?
Was school difficult for you?
followUps: If yes, what areas did you find most challenging?

questions.question: Did you make good grades?
Did you participate in extracurricular activities, like visiting the Boys & Girls Club? Or other activities?
Do you participate in team sports? Football, Basketball, Baseball, Track?
If yes, do you remember your coaches?
followUps: What type of relationship did you have with your coaches?

questions.question: Did you have a church home or ever attend church?
Do you know any Pastors or Religious Leaders?
Were you ever baptized or accept the teachings of your faith as your personal beliefs?
Do you feel that you know or have a relationship with Jesus Christ?
How old were you when you committed your first criminal offense?
How many times were you involved in a criminal act before being arrested for the current offense for which you are incarcerated?
Regarding your criminal history, please answer each of the following:
subQuestions: Did someone ask you or tell you to commit the crime? What was your relationship to them?
What did you do and why did you decide to do it?
When did you do it after being asked or told to do it?
How did you do it and were you armed to do it?
Why did you feel like you needed to do it?
